edu.ub.prog2.utils

Class BasicPlayerViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ub.prog2.utils.BasicPlayerViewer

  • public abstract class BasicPlayerViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a motor for playing audio/video and showing images (based on Vlcj)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructs a new BasicPlayerViewer instance

      Constructs a new BasicPlayerViewer instance from a path

      Constructs a new BasicPlayerViewer instance from a path and using a verbosity level

      void stop()
      Stops the playback, which will start at the beginning in case of further play or resume
